summary: Project named "Mobile Receipt"; app name must remain consistent across all pages.
architectural_notes: App name is fixed as "Mobile Receipt" and must be consistent across all pages/screens.

existing_features.title: Ensure the application name is consistently displayed as exactly “Mobile Receipt” across all pages and layouts by centralizing the app name in a single frontend constant and reusing it wherever the app name is rendered (e.g., Start page heading, navigation brand text, footer copyright text, logo alt text, and document/tab title).

new_feature_requests.summary: Keep app name consistent across all pages; app name is "Mobile Receipt".
